meanings.definition: A book or set of books enclosed in a slipcase for protection and display.
meanings.sent1: The slipcased collection of fairy tales looked elegant on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: I bought a slipcased edition of my favorite novel to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The slipcased books huddled together like a group of friends at a party.
meanings.sent4: The slipcased encyclopedia was a treasure trove of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The slipcased volume stood out among the other books with its protective cover.
